summary: This is an email chain from June 27, 2019, discussing a list of victims obtained from the side-letter to the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) in the Epstein case. The correspondence reveals that the list contains only Florida victims and that a principal New York victim is not on it.

events.title: Email Discussion of Victim List
events.description: Email correspondence discussing a list of victims obtained from the side-letter to the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) in the Epstein case, confirming the list contains only Florida victims and that a principal New York victim is not on it.

keyFacts: A list of victims was obtained from the side-letter to the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) in the Epstein case.
The list appears to contain only victims from Florida.
A principal victim from New York is confirmed not to be on the list.
The correspondence involves the Public Corruption Unit of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
